ContextSwitchingConsole - Class in contextswitching
Basic GUI console that allows the model to be executed, stopped, loaded from a checkpoint and allows for the inspection of basic model properties
ContextSwitchingConsole() - Constructor for class contextswitching.ContextSwitchingConsole
Constructors Basically constructs a console with a new simulation model as base
ContextSwitchingConsole(SimState) - Constructor for class contextswitching.ContextSwitchingConsole
 
ContextSwitchingConsole.ModelProperties - Class in contextswitching
Object to be used as an inspector of this model allows for monitoring and setting different model parameters get methods are mapped to the interface set method allow for parameter to be edited by the user
ContextSwitchingConsole.ModelProperties(SimState) - Constructor for class contextswitching.ContextSwitchingConsole.ModelProperties
 
ContextSwitchingGridRunner - Class in contextswitching.grid
Executes the exploration of a parameter space in an available JPPF grid system This Grid runner sends one job at the time sequentially for a more advanced runner that submits N jobs in parallel see ContextSwitchingParallelGridRunner
ContextSwitchingGridRunner() - Constructor for class contextswitching.grid.ContextSwitchingGridRunner
Constructor
ContextSwitchingModel - Class in contextswitching
A context switching model implemented in MASON The model stores the networks loaded from the configuration provided, the agent population and the Agent positions in the contexts
ContextSwitchingModel(long) - Constructor for class contextswitching.ContextSwitchingModel
Constructor
ContextSwitchingParallelGridRunner - Class in contextswitching.grid
Executes the exploration of a parameter space in an available JPPF grid system This Grid runner submits multiple jobs at the time to the grid and collects the results asynchronously
ContextSwitchingParallelGridRunner() - Constructor for class contextswitching.grid.ContextSwitchingParallelGridRunner
Constructor
contextSwitchingProb - Variable in class contextswitching.ModelConfiguration
